title: India's motorcycle and scooter sales likely crossed pre-Covid levels in FY 23-24
description: Industry estimates show domestic two-wheeler sales rose about 13% to 18.4-18.5 million units in FY24. Petrol-powered models comprised more than 95% of the total sales at about 17.5 million units.
